data.description: Genius Review Station Team: Join the Future of Digital Diagnostics Are you ready to make your mark in healthcare technology? Our Genius Review Station team is on a mission to revolutionize digital diagnostics—and we want you on board! As a summer intern, you’ll dive into real projects, work side-by-side with experts, and help shape applications that make a difference for patients and providers. If you’re curious, tech-savvy, and eager to learn, this is the adventure for you. What you’ll be up to during your 10-12 week adventure: - Help develop new features for our cutting-edge web applications - Explore and experiment with the latest technologies in digital diagnostics - Analyze and improve the performance of our web applications - Collaborate with teammates to design, build, and refine software - Get hands-on experience with modern tools like React, TypeScript, C# .NET, and SQL Who we’re hoping to meet: - You can work full-time during the summer (May/June - August/Septembe...
